entities.name: Article
entities.description: Structured content that is part of the knowledge base.

attributes.name: kbArticleId
attributes.description: Shows the ID of the article.

attributes.name: kbArticleTemplateId
attributes.description: Choose the template that you want to use as a base for creating the new article.

attributes.name: organizationId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the organization associated with the article.

attributes.name: subjectId
attributes.description: Choose the subject of the article to assist with article searches. You can configure subjects under Business Management in the Settings area.

attributes.name: articleXml
attributes.description: Shows the article content and formatting, stored as XML.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Type a subject or descriptive name for the article to assist with article searches.

attributes.name: number
attributes.description: Knowledge base article number.

attributes.name: content
attributes.description: Description of the content of the knowledge base article.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Type additional information that describes the knowledge base article.

attributes.name: comments
attributes.description: Comments regarding the knowledge base article.

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the knowledge base article was created.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the knowledge base article.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the knowledge base article.

attributes.name: modifiedOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the knowledge base article was last modified.

attributes.name: stateCode
attributes.description: Shows whether the knowledge base article is in draft, unapproved, or published status. Published articles are read-only and can't be edited unless they are unpublished.

attributes.name: statusCode
attributes.description: Select the article's status.

attributes.name: versionNumber
attributes.description: Title of the knowledge base article.

attributes.name: keyWords
attributes.description: Keywords to be used for searches in knowledge base articles.

attributes.name: importSequenceNumber
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

attributes.name: overriddenCreatedOn
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: createdOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the article.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the kbarticle.

attributes.name: languageCode
attributes.description: Select which language the article must be available in. This list is based on the list of language packs that are installed in your Microsoft Dynamics 365 environment.

attributes.name: exchangeRate
attributes.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

attributes.name: transactionCurrencyId
attributes.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

attributes.name: entityImageId
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: publishToWeb
attributes.description: If set to Yes, the article will be visible and searchable on portals connected to this organization.

attributes.name: averageRating
attributes.description: The average rating of this article.

attributes.name: averageRatingWholeNumber
attributes.description: The average rating of this article, rounded to a whole number (positive integer).

attributes.name: downvotes
attributes.description: The number of negative vote ratings applied to this article.

attributes.name: ratingSum
attributes.description: The sum of the values of all ratings applied to this article.

attributes.name: upvotes
attributes.description: The number of positive vote ratings applied to this article.
